eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Indiana; AT 12:28 PM ON OCT 22, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:43 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Indiana EAS System. This test is conducted in coordination with the Indiana Broadcasters as a public service to the citizens of Indiana.
